entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 01:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning then changing to snow late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
